tool_description: Estimates the number of unique speakers in an audio recording using voice characteristics analysis.

audio_file_path.description: Path to the audio file to analyze

min_speaker_duration_seconds.description: Minimum duration for speaker detection in seconds

clustering_sensitivity.description: Clustering sensitivity from 0.1 to 2.0, higher values detect more speakers

error_messages: Audio too short: Audio duration must be at least 10 seconds for reliable speaker counting.
Invalid sensitivity: Clustering sensitivity must be between 0.1 and 2.0.
Speaker duration invalid: Minimum speaker duration must be between 0.5 and 10 seconds.
Analysis failed: Speaker counting failed due to poor audio quality or processing error.
usage: Provide audio file path to estimate number of speakers. Adjust sensitivity and minimum duration for better accuracy.

confidence_score.description: Confidence in speaker count estimation from 0 to 1

speaker_activity_distribution.description: Array of speaking time percentages for each detected speaker
